TitleValidationDB_PostgreSQL.cpp File Reference

An implementation of TitleValidationDBSpec.h to use PostgreSQL. Title validation is useful for checking server logins and cd keys. More...

#include "TitleValidationDB_PostgreSQL.h"
#include "libpq-fe.h"
#include <RakAssert.h>
#include "FormatString.h"

Detailed Description

An implementation of TitleValidationDBSpec.h to use PostgreSQL. Title validation is useful for checking server logins and cd keys.
